name: object-property-value
description: Represents a value of a specific property of a BACnet object, including object, property, value, and optional priority information.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the BACnet object containing the property.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the property whose value is given.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: The index within an array property, if applicable. Optional.

fields.name: property-value
fields.description: The value of the specified property.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: The priority of the value, if applicable. Optional.
